title: Delete and re-add a policy and verify E2E flow.
custom_steps:
1. Use the REST APIs with tenant token to createa a RTP with following criteria.
    1. Traffic Filter:
          a. Source Criteria:
          b. Destination Criteria: 
    2. Traffic Action:
          a. Profile:
          b. Action:
    3. Metadata:
2. Delete the created policy using the REST APIs.
3. Recreat the same policy 
4. Verify the RTP is downloaded in the backend dppool nodes 
5. Send traffic matching the Policy criteria
6. Verify Policy enforcement is succesfull on traffic matching the policy criteria.
